title: Improve microphone animation, reduce input padding, restore button labels

requirements.text: Change the microphone button's rotating ring animation color from its current color to the theme blue color (--color-primary from the theme)

quotes: can you make it blue too (the current theme blue)

acceptanceCriteria: The rotating border animation on the microphone button uses the theme's blue color
The animation color matches the primary theme color used throughout the app

requirements.text: Reduce the vertical padding in the chat input area (MessageInput component) to make it more compact

quotes: can you also remove some of the vertical padding for the chat input area

acceptanceCriteria: The chat input area has less vertical padding than before
The input area appears more compact while remaining usable

requirements.text: Restore the text labels for the react and reply buttons that appear on message bubbles

quotes: can you also readd the labels for the react and reply buttons for messages

acceptanceCriteria: React button displays a visible text label
Reply button displays a visible text label
Labels are visible and readable on message bubbles

nonGoals: Changing the microphone animation behavior or timing
Changing button functionality beyond adding labels
